title: I Don't Suppose Anyone Wants to Buy These
author: RGold

posts.post_title: I Don't Suppose Anyone Wants to Buy These
posts.post_content:
Cards for sale. From my eBay Museum, I mean Store. 
I think they are reasonably priced. Discounted for private sales. 
Trying to accumulate cash to purchase a Goudey Lajoie for my wife's birthday. 
:D:D:D

[url]http://imageevent.com/rgold/forsale[/url]

Mission accomplished.  Now wife wants 1933 Goudey #160 Gehrig. :D:D:D

New cards added.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/rgold/rgoldscollection1933goudey/lajoie.jpg[/IMG]
Decent midgrade example, will do as a placeholder.
My wife wants your whole museum, but wants me to pay for it.:eek:
